solution_line_template: Five packages per box, with {sheets_per_package} sheets per package is {packages_per_box}*{sheets_per_package}=<<{packages_per_box}*{sheets_per_package}={sheets_per_box}>>{sheets_per_box} sheets per box.
Two boxes contain a total of {sheets_per_box}*{num_boxes}=<<{sheets_per_box}*{num_boxes}={total_sheets}>>{total_sheets} sheets.

If each newspaper requires {sheets_per_newspaper} pages, then with {total_sheets} sheets she can print {total_sheets}/{sheets_per_newspaper}=<<{total_sheets}/{sheets_per_newspaper}={num_newspapers_printable}>>{num_newspapers_printable} newspapers.
